def_cn: 你,您,你们（可用于名词前指定谈话对象）
def_en: A speaker or writer uses you to refer to the person or people that they are talking or writing to. It is possible to use you before a noun to make it clear which group of people you are talking to.

def_cn: （用于口语和非正式书面语中表示泛指）你，任何人
def_en: In spoken English and informal written English, you is sometimes used to refer to people in general.

def_cn: （某些方言中指两个或多个人时有时用yous代替you）你们
def_en: In some dialects of English, yous is sometimes used instead of 'you' when talking to two or more people.
